alert.note: Alert for Aguila Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 29 at 1:11AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following areas, Aguila Valley, Sonoran Desert Natl Monument and Tonopah Desert. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Weather disturbances interacting with a very humid airmass will make conditions favorable for flooding to occur. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

area.areaDesc: Aguila Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert
